description:
In the Advanced Blogger Blog Course.
You will learn...
How to instal a Blogger Blog Template.
Customizing your Blogger Blog Templates.
How to make a blog look like a website.
Promoting your Blogger Blog.
Using Google Hangouts to promote your blogger blog.
Have your very own youtube thumbnail.

The Advanced Blogger Blog Course has some fantastic information.
Things you may not know how to do.

Very easy to follow.
Lots of videos showing you what to do.
Over 5 hours of fantastic information.

Included are many examples from YouTube.
Plus links to Blogger Blog Templates that you can download for FREE.

And lots more.
title: How to create Blogger Blogs with blogger Advanced
